addoninfo.title: MilkDrop
addoninfo.description: MilkDrop was originally a music visualizer "plug-in" to the Winamp music player. As you listen your music, MilkDrop takes you flying through the actual soundwaves you're hearing, and uses beat detection to trigger myriad psychedelic effects, creating a rich visual journey through sound.
addoninfo.author: Team XBMC
